The Aardvark Software API comes from https://www.totalphase.com/products/aardvark-software-api/
"Aardvark Software API v5.40 (Windows 64-bit)" version was downloaded
Inside the downloaded zip folder the Aardvark.dll can be found
Inside the downloaded zip file is a file named 'aardvark_py.py', this file has been renamed to 'aardvark_wrap.py' and placed in this folder
The 'aardvark_py.py'/'aardvark_wrap.py' file has not and SHOULD NOT be modified to allow easy upgrade to future versions of api's

A manual for the API can be found in the link below or on the totalphase website if the link no longer works
https://www.totalphase.com/support/articles/200468316-Aardvark-I2C-SPI-Host-Adapter-User-Manual
